column5: I picked up a 2007 Focus wagon and I want to get the widows tinted. I never had it done to any vehicles in the past. Can anyone suggest a place to get it done? I'm looking for somewhere within 30mins of Vaughan. Any suggestions would be great. Thanks

do it yourself and save a ton .. buy Limo Tint at Wally World or Crappy Tire... I did many a car with great results... just follow the instructions.. yer Focus should run you about 60$ 3 hours and a 12pk.  Randy
Tint King on Steeles east of Keele  or  Audio Heaven by Leslie/Hwy7 http://www.audioheaven.ca/tint.html
Thanks all, I'll call them on Monday.
